text: Gernot Böhme (3 January 1937 – 20 January 2022) was a German philosopher and author. He was the director of the Institute for Practical Philosophy in Darmstadt, Hesse from 2005 until his death.Mind & Matter Vol. 9(2), "About Authors", 2011 Böhme was born in Dessau, Anhalt, Germany. As a research scientist he worked at the Max-Planck-Institute with Carl Friedrich von Weizsäcker. From 1977 to 2002 he was Professor of Philosophy at Technical University of Darmstadt. Böhme died on 20 January 2022 in Darmstadt, at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:German philosophers Category:Writers from Hesse Category:German academics
title: Gernot Böhme
